meanings.definition: Immature male germ cells that develop into spermatozoa.
meanings.sent1: Spermatids are like young seeds that grow into mature sperm.
meanings.sent2: The spermatids in the testes will eventually become sperm.
meanings.sent3: The spermatids were in a rush to grow up and become sperm.
meanings.sent4: Each spermatid is a tiny hero on a journey to become a strong sperm warrior.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the spermatids looked like little dots full of potential.

meanings.definition: A haploid cell that is the product of meiosis in the male reproductive system.
meanings.sent1: After meiosis, spermatids are formed in the male body.
meanings.sent2: The spermatids are the result of a special process in the male reproductive system.
meanings.sent3: The spermatids threw a party to celebrate their unique creation.
meanings.sent4: Each spermatid is a brave explorer in the vast world of the male reproductive system.
meanings.sent5: The spermatids danced joyfully after their formation in the male body.
